name: JBoss BPM Suite & JBoss Fuse Integration Demo
summary: Demo based on JBoss BPM Suite and JBoss Fuse products to highlight a few of the more common use cases, call a BPM process from a fuse camel route. Install options - local and Docker.
author: Christina Lin, Andrew Block, Kenny Peeples, Eric D. Schabell
targetProduct: JBoss BPM Suite and JBoss Fuse
productVersion: JBoss BRMS 5.3.1, JBoss BPM Suite 6.0.2 onwards, JBoss Fuse 6.0.0 onwards
